Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the upcoming federal budget and multiple changes are expected to affect the Australian economy. 7NEWS has exclusively reported on the significant changes made to the dole and expectations of a national energy authority feature in the budget. The Prime Minister is under pressure to increase the JobSeeker rate and while targeted support for certain segments of the population such as unemployed women above 55 years is expected the details remain elusive. The Reserve Bank's surprise rate increase adds to household financial pressures. The community is mobilizing through campaigns such as 'Raise the Rate' seeking more action on social policies and benefits for those in need.
